snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry arrived in Kabul for a previously unannounced visit with President Hamid Karzai to help break a deadlock in talks to keep American forces in Afghanistan beyond 2014.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry arrives in Afghanistan for unannounced visit with Pres Hamid Karzai to help break a deadlock in negotiations to keep American forces in Afghanistan beyond 2014.

byline.contributor: Thom Shanker contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry arrived in Kabul for a previously unannounced visit with President Hamid Karzai to help break a deadlock in talks to keep American forces in Afghanistan beyond 2014.

headline.main: Kerry Visits Afghan Leader, Seeking End to an Impasse
headline.print_headline: Kerry Visits Afghan Leader, Seeking End to an Impasse

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
